General.Name: Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures, assembles, imports, and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey and internationally. The company offers pickup vehicles, trucks, light trucks, and buses and midibuses; and Big.e, an electrical micro truck under the Anadolu Isuzu brand. It also offers after sales services. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Fatih Sultan Mehmet Mahallesi Balkan, Istanbul, Turkey, 34771

1.Name: Mr. Neset Fatih Vural
